SEARCH
Package org.apache.avro.util.springframework

Class ConcurrentReferenceHashMap.Segment

java.lang.Object
java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock
org.apache.avro.util.springframework.ConcurrentReferenceHashMap.Segment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Lock
Enclosing class:
ConcurrentReferenceHashMap<K,V>
protected final class ConcurrentReferenceHashMap.Segment extends ReentrantLock
A single segment used to divide the map to allow better concurrent performance.
See Also:

      @Nullable public <T> T doTask(int hash, @Nullable Object key, ConcurrentReferenceHashMap<K,V>.org.apache.avro.util.springframework.ConcurrentReferenceHashMap.Task<T> task)
      Apply an update operation to this segment. The segment will be locked during the update.
      Parameters:
      hash - the hash of the key
      key - the key
      task - the update operation
      Returns:
      the result of the operation
